[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the X we
need to report my name is Dave and this
is episode 1266 a and today's date is
April 28th 2017 and the title of the
episode is the Fed goes all in to crash
the economy let's get into the economic
collapse financial news now we know the
central bankers they have been pushing
their agenda for many many years
actually since 1913 but it is
accelerated since 2008 but they've been
trucking along since 1971 when we came
off the gold standard and this is where
they really pushed their agenda
throughout the years and what we're
seeing right now is they have certain
goals they want to reach they want to
reach this cashless society and this
makes it better for them because they
have full control of your currency then
you can't hide the cash you can't hide
the coins
you can't hide all this stuff because
everything's electronic in the bank
under the control of the central bank
now we can see that there are countries
right now moving in this direction India
Europe would like to do this the United
States would like to do this and many
other countries are going to jump on
board if the central bankers get their
way and we can see that South Korea
right now they are actually heading in
this direction and they're already among
the least cash dependant countries in
the world and they started a trial
phase-out of coins and they're trying to
get rid of all coins now instead of
making change and giving you coins what
they're going to do is they're going to
have a prepaid card so if you get change
it goes on to this prepaid card and then
you use that and eventually what's going
to happen is they'll get rid of the
paper money and everything will be just
credit debit and however else they're
going to do it but for the interim
portion of this going into a cashless
society they're going to be using a
prepaid card and I wouldn't be surprised
if other countries follow suit and they
do the same exact thing because we know
the central bankers goal is to have a
Cancer Society to take control of
everyone's accounts and to basically
control track the everyday person that's
the main objective to all this because
in the end the central bankers and this
is the Rothschild bank this is the Bank
of International Settlements and most of
the countries do have central banks
today some have the and I'm talking
about the private western central bank
let's not be confused here others have
central banks where the people's
government control it like in Russia it
was a private west central bank where
the Rothschilds did control it Putin
came in and actually took control of
that central bank and he calls the shots
in Russia we can see do-dirty he's
getting ready to get rid of the central
bank there that's run by the Rothschild
we see Hungary the same thing they've
gotten rid of their central bank that's
run by the Rothschild
Iceland has taken control and actually
jailed bankers for their complete mess
in 2008 and most of the countries today
yes they do have a private western
central bank run by the Rothschild bank
and this is something that we need to
break apart this is something that we
need to get rid of here in the United
States and this is what we need to focus
on because the central bank this is the
major problem of all our problems when
it comes down to what is happening with
the monetary system all the way through
to war now here in the United States we
see that this central banking system it
is completely deteriorating it's falling
apart it's accelerating and every time
we report on this we see things rapidly
getting worse and worse and worse but we
can see that they're continually trying
to make it seem like everything well
it's still chugging along and they come
out with their consumer confidence
and they say everything is fine and
what's very interesting is that every
time they come out with consumer
confidence they tell you that the
consumers are feeling good everything
looks great but when you really look at
what's going on you see real wage growth
well that is declined over the years
people are making less now people are
spending less now stores are closing
people are losing their part-time and
full-time jobs GDP is in the dumper and
how can everyone say that consumer
confidence is holding steady or moving
up at this point it's absolutely
ridiculous when you come to think about
it it doesn't even make sense
especially when you see corporate
defaults when we see credit card
defaults on the rise more people putting
expenses on credit cards because they
just don't have the cash because they
don't have the jobs so when we look at
this we can see that what they're
putting out there makes no sense
whatsoever and the stock market keeps
going higher and higher and higher and
we can tell that this is all completely
manipulated to keep us in this illusion
and we've been kept in this illusion for
a very long time and this illusion it is
dying right now and we understand that
70% of GDP is made up of US consumer
spending and we are continually seeing
spending decline over time it's not
moving up it's not getting better
it's actually declining and US consumer
spending is at point two three percent
annualized this was the worst print
going back to 2009 and according to beas
gold sikh models even as retail sales
have tumbled as Obamacare continued to
drain disposable income people did spend
their funds on something and that was
recreational vehicles now they spent
less on cars less on clothing less on
housing and
spent more on recreational goods and
vehicles which falls into the category
of weapons RVs camping equipment and you
start to wonder are they doing this
because they understand what is going on
they understand that they're going to
need to be on the move
that they're going to need a weapon
they're going to need supplies when
things start to really fall apart and
the last time spending on recreational
vehicles and goods went up like this was
last year at this time and last year
they knew that the economy really wasn't
doing well we were being lied to
jobs weren't coming back we were
continually losing jobs and people were
preparing for the worst today with Trump
in the presidency people are still
feeling the same way where nothing is
improved jobs aren't coming back and
we're headed towards a huge financial
crisis now the Atlanta Fed was
continually putting out their estimates
over time and they went from all the way
from 3% all the way down to point what
was a 2.2 percent or so and the final
numbers came in and most likely these
will be revised lower the final GDP
number came in around 0.7 percent down
from 2.1 in the last quarter and of
course below the expected 1% which they
thought they were going to get now
remember this is the manipulated number
that the government is putting out there
and if you look at shadow stats or any
other calculation besides the
government's calculation you can see
that the GDP numbers are in the negative
range they're not in the positive range
this is the collapse of the system now
the Fed does believe that things are
going to improve throughout this year
and they think that things are going to
get better
and they think that we're going to hit
the target of a great GDP number of
maybe 2.8 percent or so which is hard to
believe because what is going to change
in the next quarter
are re all of a sudden going to see
people spend like crazy retail stores
are going to start to open up instead of
closed down because remember 70% of GDP
is you u.s. consumer spending so how is
this going to change in the second
quarter in the third quarter in the
fourth quarter because as we are seeing
right now as healthcare premiums go up
this is included in the spending more
and more individuals are taking the tax
penalty instead of purchasing insurance
so that plus people not actually
spending in retail we're going to see
these numbers drop even further so what
the Fed is telling us doesn't really
make that much sense at all now we can
see that the government well they on
they are on the precipice of shutting
down but don't worry
Congress figured out a way to keep the
government open and we talked about the
government shutdown yesterday it really
means absolutely nothing it's something
they use to scare the American people
into doing what they want so Congress
decided to pass this stopgap spending
bill for seven days and it goes to the
President's desk and most likely he will
sign it and we can see that we're still
going to come up with the same exact
problem where they're going to have to
debate about keeping the government open
and if it does shut down it will
probably just be shut down for a little
while we'll have to see if Trump uses
the same tactics as Obama to prove his
point where he had the federal employees
bring out those gates put him in front
of monuments shut
things down to make it look really good
while everyone kept their limousines
there are private jets and everything
else their restaurant the golf course
and everything else they have and of
course that was done on purpose to make
everyone see that
this is what happens when the government
shuts down and of course this was a dog
and pony show and really when the
government shuts down many people don't
even notice it it shut down many many
times in the past which we discussed
yesterday now the Fed is looking at this
entire economy and they have just
signaled that they are not going to stop
raising interest rates they don't care
if GDP is at 0.7% point two percent
negative point five percent it makes no
difference because their models show
that the economy is going to improve
this is just temporary and we are going
to raise rates rapidly throughout this
year and this is coming from the Federal
Reserve and they're saying that they
expect in the second quarter and they
might get it they expect 2.8 percent now
they'll probably get this if they
manipulate the numbers but this is what
they're expecting and it's even going to
get better as we go throughout this year
and this is why we can raise interest
rates what they're really doing right
now
and go back to 2008 go back before that
when they started to raise interest
rates where they told you that
everything was fine even though the
subprime securities they were complete
garbage even though the rated triple-a
and they started to raise interest rates
saying say the economy is fine
everything's back on track we have the
subprime securities the triple-a people
are buying houses this is why we can
raise rates right now even when things
were falling apart they told you that
everything was contained that this is
going to turn out ok for everyone we're
not even forecasting any type of
recession this is what they're doing
right now they know this economy is done
and what they're doing is they're going
all-in and they're pushing the agenda to
shut the system down now I said this in
a
fast this is a race on who's going to
crash the economy and who is going to
tell the story of who is to blame for
this
because Trump's mission right now which
I do believe is to get rid of the
Federal Reserve what other reason would
he hang up Andrew Jackson in the White
House because Andrew Jackson campaigned
on getting rid of the central banking
system which he did and yes they tried
to assassinate him which failed and we
can see right now that as we move
forward throughout this year the Fed is
going to accelerate their plans to crash
the system Trump most likely is going to
do the same and this is a race now there
is no question that this system is going
to come down it's not going to improve
and as we've been tracking it and we've
been looking at everything that's been
going on the only thing that has kind of
improved and it looks like it's improved
is the stock market moving up but when
we talk about retail and we talk about
everything else these are all bubbles
housing it's a bubble student loan it's
a bubble autos it's a bubble stock
market it's a bubble bond it's a bubble
and the race is on to blow these bubbles
up as fast as they possibly can so they
can pop and when they do pop it's going
to be a nightmare situation no matter
who brings the economy down because when
the economy comes down it doesn't matter
if it's the central bank or if it's
Trump because the situation is is
exactly the same everyone is going to
most likely lose their job lose their

the only difference there's going to be
between the
central bank and Trump bringing down the

if you have not prepared
I would suggest preparing now because

listen everyone thanks a lot for

be prepared thanks a lot
